title: What's your favorite Elementalist Lux skin [POLL]
body:
[](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/lux_sale_lcu_tier2.jpg?itok=-7dg6ygi)
~~Obviously the title explains everything but I'm just gonna repeat it here. Lol. Just vote what your favorite Elementalist Lux skin is!~~
**"This thread is now Draven's thread, YEAH!" -Draven**
http://pa1.narvii.com/5779/f59d55fc6b3d62bf35531010fc308a5656523954_hq.gif

~~Personally, my favorite is the Mystic skin because it's so kawaii but I also like the Fire skin. =^.^=~~
**"No one has skins like me!" -Draven**

replies.body:
Where's Star Guardian Draven? Downvoted.

(issa joke)

Omg yesss

you know what they say. If it's memes you wish. you ask the Fish.
**"The minions running the boards only allowed an option to have ten votes. I guess they just couldn't handle all of me!" -Draven**
has to be light draven, hes more photogenic
Where's nude Draven on the poll?
**"The boards minions don't really allow that. They're no fun." -Draven**
